definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: If you like, you can also dismember them.
sentences.chinese: 如果玩者樂意的話，還可以肢解受害者的屍體。

sentences.english: For instance, Super Mario World requires players to keep going forward to save the Princess.
sentences.chinese: 如，超級瑪里奧世界需要玩者繼續前進，挽救公主。

definition: player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
to search for subtle traces/to ponder
to become demoralized/to lose one's sense of purpose
